amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 116-61 to ask the GAO to conduct a cost benefit analysis of the establishment of State-administered health insurance plans for states that may want to offer a public option in their health insurance exchanges; the report would be due to Congress no later than one year after enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Lynch.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
